segments.text: Looking at this kitchen scene, it seems like a typical afternoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all neat and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's busy with dishes, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, looking proper and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet is running full blast!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's full, and water's spilling everywhere onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess; someone's going to have to clean that up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are over by the cabinet, up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing on that stool to get to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back; he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, reaching for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is about to turn into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
